thread.title: Historic Criminal Justice Bill Passes Senate Judiciary Committee (Drug Policy Alliance)

author: wn.com
title: Historic Criminal Justice Bill Passes Senate Judiciary Committee (Drug Policy Alliance)
text: ( Source : Drug Policy Alliance ) Today , the Senate Judiciary Committee voted 15 to 5 to advance the Sentencing Reform and Corrections Act. The bill , introduced by Senator Chuck Grassley (R-IA), and sponsored by ten other Senators, would
